control_attributes.Control: SC-23 (1) INVALIDATE SESSION IDENTIFIERS AT LOGOUT
control_attributes.control_description: The information system invalidates session identifiers upon user logout or other session termination.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system includes components specifically designed to be the target of malicious attacks for the purpose of detecting, deflecting, and analyzing such attacks.

Control Statement: The information system invalidates session identifiers upon user logout or other session termination.
